description:
Zed open-source code editor built in Rust with a GPU-accelerated renderer has been officially launched for Linux.

The post Zed Code Editor Now Available for Linux appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Zed Code Editor Now Available for Linux

description:
Colin Percival, FreeBSD release engineering lead, has recently announced changes to FreeBSD release schedule and support period.

The post FreeBSD Announces Changes to Release Schedule and Support Period appeared first on Linux Today.
title: FreeBSD Announces Changes to Release Schedule and Support Period

description:
Coming about five weeks after the LibreOffice 24.2.4 update, LibreOffice 24.2.5 is here to introduce more fixes for those annoying issues, bugs, crashes, regression, and other problems reported by users in the latest LibreOffice 24.2 series. In numbers, the LibreOffice 24.2.5 point release addresses a total of 78 bugs.

The post LibreOffice 24.2.5 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download With 78 Bug Fixes appeared first on Linux Today.
title: LibreOffice 24.2.5 Office Suite Is Now Available for Download With 78 Bug Fixes

description:
New Exim 4.98 MTA addresses critical SMTP vulnerabilities. Includes crucial updates for DKIM handling and SMTP security.

The post Exim 4.98 Patches Over 30 Bugs, Bolsters Email Server Security appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Exim 4.98 Patches Over 30 Bugs, Bolsters Email Server Security
